C

close() - Method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.EventBus
Clear all subscribers from the cache.

D

DeadEvent - Class in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Wraps an event that was posted, but which had no subscribers and thus could not be delivered.
DeadEvent(Object, Object) - Constructor for class io.github.pustike.eventbus.DeadEvent
Creates a new DeadEvent.
DefaultSubscriberLoader - Class in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Default Cache that uses ConcurrentHashMap to store subscribeMethods and eventType hierarchy.
DefaultSubscriberLoader() - Constructor for class io.github.pustike.eventbus.DefaultSubscriberLoader
 
Dispatcher - Class in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Handler for dispatching events to subscribers, providing different event ordering guarantees that make sense for different situations.
Dispatcher() - Constructor for class io.github.pustike.eventbus.Dispatcher
 

E

EventBus - Class in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Dispatches events to listeners, and provides ways for listeners to register themselves.

EventBus(String, Dispatcher, Executor, SubscriberLoader) - Constructor for class io.github.pustike.eventbus.EventBus
Creates a new EventBus using external cache for subscriberMethods and eventSuperTypes.
ExceptionEvent - Class in io.github.pustike.eventbus
When any exceptions occur on the bus during handler execution, this event will be published.
ExceptionEvent(EventBus, Object, Method, Object, Throwable) - Constructor for class io.github.pustike.eventbus.ExceptionEvent

I

immediate() - Static method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.Dispatcher
Returns a dispatcher that dispatches events to subscribers immediately as they're posted without using an intermediate queue to change the dispatch order.
invalidateAll() - Method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.DefaultSubscriberLoader
 
invalidateAll() - Method in interface io.github.pustike.eventbus.SubscriberLoader
Discards all entries in the cache.
io.github.pustike.eventbus - module io.github.pustike.eventbus
Event Bus based on publish-subscribe pattern.
io.github.pustike.eventbus - package io.github.pustike.eventbus
EventBus allows publish-subscribe-style communication between components without requiring components to explicitly register with one another (and thus be aware of each other).

P

perThreadDispatchQueue() - Static method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.Dispatcher
Returns a dispatcher that queues events that are posted reentrantly on a thread that is already dispatching an event, guaranteeing that all events posted on a single thread are dispatched to all subscribers in the order they are posted.
publish(Object) - Method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.EventBus
Posts an event to all registered subscribers.

R

register(Object) - Method in class io.github.pustike.eventbus.EventBus
Registers the specified subscriber to the event bus.

S

Subscribe - Annotation Type in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Marks a method as an event subscriber.
SubscriberLoader - Interface in io.github.pustike.eventbus
Cache for subscriberMethods that are annotated with @Subscribe in a given class and all its super-classes.

T

threadSafe() - Method in annotation type io.github.pustike.eventbus.Subscribe
Marks an event subscriber method as being thread-safe.
